title: The Githyanki Warrior
content:
lled the Risen Road. The githyanki Zorru spoke of could be near.

Go to Lae'zel near the mountain pass in the northwest.

We found a group of githyanki, and Lae'zel ran ahead to speak with them. We should join her.

Travel to the mountain pass.

The githyanki called Kith'rak Voss revealed that a Githyanki Créche was nestled in the mountains beyond the western bridge. We should travel there with Lae'zel.

Find the entrance to the créche.
